section.title: Options and parameters

image.alt: Figure shows Translation Memory Selection window

ul.li: The Available listbox shows the names of the available Translation Memory databases. To add a Translation Memory to the Selected listbox either double-click the Translation Memory name or select it using the keyboard and press the Enter-key.

The Selected listbox lists the names of the selected Translation Memory databases. To remove a Translation Memory from the Selected listbox either double-click the Translation Memory name or select it using the keyboard and press the Enter-key.

section.p: Press the OK button to leave the selection window and return to the previous window or press the Cancel button to leave the window and discard any changes made to the list of selected Translation Memory databases.
